channel.title: Chateau DIY
channel.desc: Things get heated as Nick and Nicole battle a flatpack kitchen before their baby arrives in two weeks.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: Jonnie Irwin is on property hunting mission with a couple to make a move from the Essex coast to the Suffolk countryside.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Tom Kerridge Sunday Lunch
channel.desc: Tom gives a masterclass on how to make the perfect roast pork.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey
channel.desc: Simon adds some zing to a Summer salad with kohlrabi and radishes, then impresses with a crispy and creamy Mushroom and Leek Potato Pie that has some serious flavour.
